headline: No Guidance, No Call: Guggenheim Downgrades Informatica (INFA) Post–Q2 Results
summary: Informatica Inc. (NYSE:INFA) is one of the Hot AI Stocks on Wall Street’s Radar. On August 7, Guggenheim analyst Howard Ma downgraded the stock from Buy to Neutral. The downgrade follows Informatica’s second-quarter results, particularly due to the pending acquisition by Salesforce. The firm said that Informatica will not be hosting an earnings conference call to discuss […]
